snippet.title: Hunt 'n Sneak | Launched on Steam Now!
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/689610/Hunt_n_Sneak/

Light is both friend and foe in Hunt ‘n Sneak – a manic hide and seek party game set in a world where mystical creatures dwell. Threatened by the fearsome Gobblers, the Pixies’ struggle for survival has begun. Will you use your wit to sneak past the Gobblers, or use your cunning to hunt the elusive Pixies?

Follow us:
Website: https://huntnsneak.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/huntnsneak/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/HuntNSneak/
Discord: https://discord.gg/WTJTZ2c
